part.narration: Yuki makes her way home. Nearby, Kenneth and Kyou wolk the street, fishing rod in hand.This firmly establishes that even optional candidates are persistent within the game-world.Next to them lightly treads another man.
part.line: ...we used to be at the forefront of software engineering.
But then The Group shut down the R&D Department.
They've turned us into the TOSE of our own product.
And all of our research is being used for that accursed machine...
It procedurally generates Dragon Quests, Final Fantasies, Star Oceans, you name it.
Or rather, you open a terminal and it names it for you.
Ugh, such wasted computational power on ephemeral fantasias.
If they're letting computers make the games, then they won't need me.
